item.description:
If you plan on organiizing a ride or event or contributing in some other role, come!

I've limited the RSVP's to 5 on this to keep a focused group. I've also turned the waiting list on as well.

I won't chase any one away if we get more than 5 showing up, it's just the way these diners are with seating.. 5 is kinda pushing it as it is.

Lemme know if you have questions :)

Paul
item.how_to_find_us: If you come in a car then you might need help finding us as we are invisible to cars.
item.why: No one here gets up early enough for breakfast :) This is an organizers brunch to talk about where to take the club this year, rides, touring etc..
item.name: Organizers Brunch
